# 2023–24 CONCACAF Awards

| award1_type      = CONCACAF Best Player of the Year Award
| award1_winner    = '''Men's: Adalberto Carrasquilla Women's: Melchie Dumornay

| previous         = 2022

}}
The nominees were announced on July 23, 2024.
The winners were announced on 24 October 2024.
